title: Advanced Mathematics Inquiry in Virtual Worlds: Utilizing Multi-User Environments

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and programming basics
context.additional_context: Learners collaborate in virtual environments to solve complex mathematical problems, structured with two weekly face-to-face classes and three virtual sessions

learning_goals: Learners can generate 3D geometric models in a virtual world environment to visually interpret nonlinear equations.
Learners design optimization problem-solving strategies through real-time collaboration with peers in a multi-user virtual environment.
Learners create reports applying mathematical reasoning based on data collected through virtual world activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
